tweet.text: Aurelia Brazeal: 1st Foreign Service Officer to rise from entry level to senior Foreign Service ranks. Ambassador to #Micronesia, #Kenya, & #Ethiopia, and 1st African American woman named U.S. Ambassador by three different presidents. https://t.co/x0TkoQ2FrW #BlackHistoryMonth https://t.co/xcIKey4FAk
tweet.html: Aurelia Brazeal: 1st Foreign Service Officer to rise from entry level to senior Foreign Service ranks. Ambassador to #Micronesia, #Kenya, & #Ethiopia, and 1st African American woman named U.S. Ambassador by three different presidents. go.usa.gov/xnsuB #BlackHistoryMonth
